entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
